scripts.build: npm run build:server && npm run build:client
scripts.build:server: rimraf -r build/server && tsc && cp -r node_modules build/server && cp -r src/server/views build/server
scripts.build:client: rimraf -r build/client && parcel build src/client/index.tsx --public-url ./ -d build/client --no-cache
scripts.watch:server: nodemon --ext ts,ejs --watch src/server --exec "tsc && cp -r src/server/views build/server && dotenv -- node build/server"
